mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cs FROM SOLAR_POWER_ARIA

SELECT A.IPPT, A.IPPTNM, A.HOGI, SUM(A.QPOWER) AS SUMM, AVG(A.QPOWER) AS FULL_AVG, ROUND(SUM(A.QPOWER) * (SELECT SMP_AVG FROM (SELECT * FROM ROYAL.TB_SMP_LAND ORDER BY SMP_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1), 0) AS gain FROM ROYAL.SOLAR_POWER_TIME A WHERE A.DGENYMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.DGENHMS <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'hh24:mi:ss') GROUP BY A.IPPT, A.IPPTNM, A.HOGI ORDER BY A.IPPTNM
SELECT SMP_AVG FROM ( SELECT * FROM ROYAL.TB_SMP_LAND ORDER BY SMP_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT REC_LANDAVG, REC_JEJUAVG FROM ( SELECT * FROM ROYAL.TB_REC ORDER BY REC_AT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.IPPT, A.IPPTNM, A.HOGI, SUM(A.QPOWER) AS SUMM , AVG(A.QPOWER) , ROUND(SUM(A.QPOWER) * (SELECT SMP_AVG FROM ( SELECT * FROM ROYAL.TB_SMP_LAND ORDER BY SMP_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1),0) FROM ROYAL.SOLAR_POWER_TIME A WHERE A.DGENYMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.DGENHMS <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'hh24:mi:ss') GROUP BY A.IPPT, A.IPPTNM, A.HOGI ORDER BY SUM(A.QPOWER) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 7

SELECT IPPT, IPPTNM, HOGI, QSUM, Q01, Q02, Q03, Q04, Q05, Q06, Q07, Q08, Q09, Q10, Q11, Q12, Q13, Q14, Q15, Q16, Q17, Q18, Q19, Q20, Q21, Q22, Q23, Q24 FROM SOLAR_POWER_MST WHERE DGENYMD = '${dateString}' AND IPPT = '85S1'
SELECT * FROM TB_GENPREDICT WHERE PRE_DATE = '${dateString}' AND IPPT = '85S1'

SELECT DGENYMD, SUM(Q01) AS Q01_Total, SUM(Q02) AS Q02_Total, SUM(Q03) AS Q03_Total, SUM(Q04) AS Q04_Total, SUM(Q05) AS Q05_Total, SUM(Q06) AS Q06_Total, SUM(Q07) AS Q07_Total, SUM(Q08) AS Q08_Total, SUM(Q09) AS Q09_Total, SUM(Q10) AS Q10_Total, SUM(Q11) AS Q11_Total, SUM(Q12) AS Q12_Total, SUM(Q13) AS Q13_Total, SUM(Q14) AS Q14_Total, SUM(Q15) AS Q15_Total, SUM(Q16) AS Q16_Total, SUM(Q17) AS Q17_Total, SUM(Q18) AS Q18_Total, SUM(Q19) AS Q19_Total, SUM(Q20) AS Q20_Total, SUM(Q21) AS Q21_Total, SUM(Q22) AS Q22_Total, SUM(Q23) AS Q23_Total, SUM(Q24) AS Q24_Total FROM SOLAR_POWER_MST WHERE DGENYMD = '2023-09-08' GROUP BY DGENYMD

SELECT PRE_DATE, SUM(P1) AS P1_Total, SUM(P2) AS P2_Total, SUM(P3) AS P3_Total, SUM(P4) AS P4_Total, SUM(P5) AS P5_Total, SUM(P6) AS P6_Total, SUM(P7) AS P7_Total, SUM(P8) AS P8_Total, SUM(P9) AS P9_Total, SUM(P10) AS P10_Total, SUM(P11) AS P11_Total, SUM(P12) AS P12_Total, SUM(P13) AS P13_Total, SUM(P14) AS P14_Total, SUM(P15) AS P15_Total, SUM(P16) AS P16_Total, SUM(P17) AS P17_Total, SUM(P18) AS P18_Total, SUM(P19) AS P19_Total, SUM(P20) AS P20_Total, SUM(P21) AS P21_Total, SUM(P22) AS P22_Total, SUM(P23) AS P23_Total, SUM(P24) AS P24_Total FROM TB_GENPREDICT WHERE PRE_DATE = '09/08/2023' GROUP BY PRE_DATE

SELECT SUM(P1 + P2 + P3 + P4 + P5 + P6 + P7 + P8 + P9 + P10 + P11 + P12 + P13 + P14 + P15 + P16 + P17 + P18 + P19 + P20 + P21 + P22 + P23 + P24) AS Total FROM TB_GENPREDICT WHERE PRE_DATE = '08/09/2023'
